name: Toon Story
description: Activate this card by paying 1000LP. This card allows Special Summoning of ''Toon'' cards (by tributing 1 monster if it''s Level 5 or 6, two if it''s Level 7 or higher). If your opponent doesn''t control a "Toon" monster, "Toon" monsters you control can attack your opponent directly. If this card is destroyed, destroy all the "Toon" monsters on the field.
